html:
10.1.20  9:23 am   Hi bill , hope you are doing fine
My question is  
What is meaning of "GOING BACK TO HOME"
What does home means
You've mentioned it in many songs
As far as i can remember it was in
I'm crazy/it's raining
Outside ( can't go back to where i come from!

Is that home ? If yes ,then what is home?)

In la de da de da de da de day oh ( when will you come back home ...and in outro
Just got home , got no home , i can't go home)
Do we all need to go back home 

      'home' is where you seem to belong. that's just what the word means

10.1.20  9:21 am   Are you're pants blue?

      no

10.1.20  8:53 am   Which of your songs is most suitable for a discerning man of culture? 

      hey mom i beat the scale

10.1.20  8:53 am   Bill, are you secretly a cow?

      i either don't know or can't tell you

10.1.20  8:41 am   Why are humans violent

      we are a close cousin of animals (violent)

10.1.20  7:32 am   any tips on what to do when stuck while writing a song?

      pretend you're writing a video which happens to have the song in it. even if you don't even come up with any video, thinking that way often encourages the song to get places

10.1.20  6:42 am   do you think you'll ever get around to doing that thing that you've been planning on doing for so long now?

     sure

     what's stopping you?

     doing other things that i've also been planning for a long time also

10.1.20  6:26 am   why do you underline everything that you write in videos?

      that's usually a depiction of the ground

10.1.20  6:26 am   When is your next video

      doing it now

10.1.20  5:56 am   what have you been learning

      how slowly exponential growth actually goes, for so long, before it reaches that sweet inflection point

10.1.20  4:19 am   i only recently discovered your music and i just can't stop listening. why/how is your music so dang addictive??

      perhaps it's the devil's music

10.1.20  3:09 am   What is your favorite thing about yourself?

      my ability to blend in seamlessly with the fabric of society

10.1.20  2:51 am   What do you think makes a musical idea interesting?

      if it makes you feel a way you've never felt before

10.1.20  1:16 am   do you know why you have such a strong desire to live a completely examined life? are there videos of you examining videos of you examining videos?

      yes

10.1.20  12:03 am   is a floor a sideways wall?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

9.30.20  11:27 pm   What's your favorite currency?

      time

9.30.20  11:24 pm   as an artist how to you happen upon one of those Consistent Visual Languages (tm) my professors always told me about

      actually, the game that's being played actually works the other way around. You, the artist, do some stuff. then the professors try to find a way to explain it. actually there's 1 or 2 steps usually in between that but that's a story for another time

9.30.20  10:19 pm   its the end of the world  how should i capitalize on this?

      make a brand new world

9.30.20  10:12 pm   what is music

      like a reflection of you, but not a reflection. actual

9.30.20  9:54 pm   Did you mix a white shirt and a pink shirt together in the song "i just did a bad thing"?

      i doubt it

9.30.20  9:36 pm   is there something behind your songs that you want to tell us in a secret way?

      sure

9.30.20  8:35 pm   hey what's your favourite keyboard shortcut?

      the space bar, to put a space between words

9.30.20  7:33 pm   How to live?

      impossible. it can't be done

9.30.20  7:29 pm   What are your favorite chord voicings for the keyboard? Also whats your favorite chord?

      it changes every moment, in such a way that when each one is played in each corresponding moment it spells out a portrait of what it feels like for me to be a person on earth at that particular time

9.30.20  7:19 pm   Ever think about movies?

      it's on my to do list

9.30.20  7:10 pm   what is spirituality?

      it's like going to the store not to buy something but because you work there

9.30.20  6:37 pm   Sooo how long until new video..?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.30.20  5:34 pm   during the line "im having a bad dream, i wonder what this bad dream means" in the video for "i just did a bad thing", on screen it says "put thing into thing, or else lose please" with a graphic of a thing attempting to be put into a thing. was this inspired by any actual bad dreams of yours?

      it was not inspired by a bad dream, it actually IS the bad dream. the dream is about having all these majestic feelings of how the video should be, but if you try to actually do that it will take so long that everyone will think you are dead many times over. so you have to just put some stupid shapes on the screen and hope you don't get sued for being so stupid

9.30.20  5:30 pm   how do you feel about Ohio?

      scientists estimate that the average person lives in Ohio

9.30.20  4:07 pm   when do you think the next video will come out

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.30.20  4:03 pm   Is your new song a song?

      let me perform some calculations

9.30.20  3:42 pm   how do you straighten a hat out

      world peace must be achieved first

9.30.20  3:41 pm   What should I write my college essay about?

      you could pose the question 'what the heck is a college'

9.30.20  3:38 pm   why is the universe so confusing and weird? 

      this is so you don't get bored

9.30.20  3:09 pm   how did you go about writing might quit's lyrics?

      i already knew the entire melody for the verse, because that came to me in a dream. normally i come up with melody and lyrics at the exact same time, but this was an exception. back to your original question, i made them up

9.30.20  2:55 pm   Are you stuck in a paradox

      yes and no

9.30.20  2:48 pm   What is a wall?

      very difficult to describe, but it's like blindfold for the entire room

9.30.20  2:46 pm   Ok serious question. Do you have any advice about writing songs? I want to start doing that and I'm kind of having trouble doing it.

      sometimes you can widen the net a little, and write things that might be songs but you're not sure

9.30.20  2:38 pm   Can you talk about potatoes being the best food

      no but i can talk about how they are the best literary device

9.30.20  2:35 pm   are you the thing inventor that was invented by another thing inventor?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.30.20  2:31 pm   whats your favorite kind of weather?

      special

9.30.20  2:12 pm   how did you like the movie whiplash?

      it was ok except the part when they made it look like music resembles trying to strangle a baby

9.30.20  2:11 pm   when do you think you'll upload your new video?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.30.20  2:09 pm   What inspired your unique psychedelic format of jingles? 

      just trying to get by

9.30.20  2:06 pm   who inspired you to make music?

      music itself inspires me, because it is such an obvious tool for inspiring others, and myself at the same time maybe

9.30.20  1:33 pm   What's it like to be you? 

      feels like being on a game show where you are supposed to move the entire planet, using only an ordinary tablespoon

9.30.20  1:31 pm   is hello sexy pants about sexy pants or pants that are sexy?

      after doing some introspection i've concluded that it might actually be about a desk

9.30.20  1:30 pm   What music genre/genres would you label your music as?

      normal

9.30.20  1:06 pm   why do we get sad?

      sometimes it helps propel the story along

9.30.20  12:09 pm   when is your next video

      doing it now
